alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wheeler and southeastern Hemphill Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms training across areas near Allison, or 21 miles west of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rainfall and minor flooding are expected. Locations impacted include... Briscoe and Allison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
